alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:25PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Robeson County through 345 PM EDT... At 325 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rex, or 8 miles east of Red Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Pauls, Rex, Tolarsville, Parkton, Rennert and Lumber Bridge. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 27 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
